avalancheActivity.comment:
The surface of the snowpack will only just freeze and will already soften in the late morning. The fresh snow and in particular the sometimes deep wind slabs can be released by a single winter sport participant and generally at intermediate and high altitudes. These are to be found especially in gullies and bowls, and behind abrupt changes in the terrain.
In particular in the regions with a lot of snow more medium-sized and large moist and wet avalanches are possible as a consequence of warming. The wind slabs of the weekend will become increasingly prone to triggering in particular on steep sunny slopes.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Fresh wind slabs require caution. In addition the danger of dry and wet avalanches will increase as the day progresses.

snowpackStructure.comment:
In some places new snow and wind slabs are lying on the smooth surface of an old snowpack. This applies in particular at intermediate and high altitudes and along the border with Switzerland.
In some cases the wind slabs have bonded poorly with the old snowpack.
Sunny slopes: As a consequence of rising temperatures and solar radiation a crust formed on the surface.
The new snow of the weekend has settled to a large extent in particular on steep sunny slopes.

tendency.comment: The meteorological conditions will facilitate a slow strengthening of the snowpack.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The new snow and wind slabs of the weekend can be released naturally especially on steep sunny slopes. As a consequence of warming during the day, the likelihood of moist and wet avalanches being released will increase. Field observations and artificially triggered avalanches confirm this situation.
The wind slabs of the weekend are to be evaluated with care and prudence in particular in very steep terrain. In particular gullies and bowls as well as places that are protected from the wind: The fresh wind slabs can in some cases be released, even by a single winter sport participant and reach medium size.
avalancheActivity.highlights: As a consequence of warming during the day and solar radiation more moist and wet avalanches are to be expected.

snowpackStructure.comment:
In some places new snow and wind slabs are lying on the smooth surface of an old snowpack. This applies especially at high altitudes and in high Alpine regions.
The weather conditions will give rise to increasing moistening of the snowpack on sunny slopes. Sunny slopes: As a consequence of sharply rising temperatures and partly cloudy skies a crust will form on the surface during the next few days.

tendency.comment: These conditions will facilitate a gradual strengthening of the snowpack.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The more recent wind slabs of the weekend must be evaluated with care and prudence. In particular gullies and bowls as well as places that are protected from the wind: These can in some cases be released by a single winter sport participant.
In particular on steep sunny slopes more dry and moist avalanches are possible as a consequence of warming during the day and solar radiation. In the regions exposed to heavier precipitation more avalanches are possible as the day progresses, in particular medium-sized ones.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The avalanche danger will increase a little during the day.

snowpackStructure.comment:
In some places new snow and wind slabs are lying on the smooth surface of an old snowpack. This applies especially at high altitudes and in high Alpine regions, along the border with France.
Sunshine and high temperatures will give rise from early morning to rapid moistening of the snowpack on sunny slopes. Sunny slopes: As a consequence of sharply rising temperatures and solar radiation a crust formed on the surface during the last few days.
In localities where the night is overcast the danger will increase earlier.

tendency.comment: As a consequence of falling temperatures, the natural avalanche activity will appreciably decrease.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The mostly small wind slabs of the weekend can be released by a single winter sport participant in isolated cases. This applies in particular in gullies and bowls, and behind abrupt changes in the terrain in particular at intermediate and high altitudes.
As a consequence of warming during the day, the likelihood of moist and wet avalanches being released will increase in particular on steep sunny slopes. The new snow and wind slabs of the weekend can be released naturally especially on steep sunny slopes.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wet avalanches as the day progresses.

snowpackStructure.comment:
In some places new snow and wind slabs are lying on the smooth surface of an old snowpack. This applies especially at high altitudes and in high Alpine regions, along the border with France.
Sunshine and high temperatures will give rise from early morning to increasing moistening of the snowpack in some places on sunny slopes. Sunny slopes: As a consequence of sharply rising temperatures and solar radiation a crust will form on the surface during the next few days.
